matched_points.point: Occasionally explains late arrivals by citing busyness, with a hint of mild fatigue in the tone.
Hopes to ease the tension between them with brief responses while maintaining personal privacy.
A has just received a work transfer notice and the sudden increase in work pressure has resulted in reduced daily communication.
Sensitive and perceptive, with strong empathy and a yearning for more companionship.
Expresses concern through gentle questions and subtle hints, trying to prompt A to explain more about the situation.
Hopes to receive more emotional feedback from A to bridge the growing communication gap.
